00024 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 // Function: SystemColumnDeleteCommand()
00026 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 SystemColumnDeleteCommand::SystemColumnDeleteCommand(SystemColumnLayout* layout, SystemColumn* column,
00028                                                      QUndoCommand* parent) : QUndoCommand(parent),
00029                                                                              layout_(layout),
00030                                                                              column_(column), del_(true)
00031 {
00032     // Create child commands for removing connections.
00033     foreach (QGraphicsItem* item, column->childItems())
00034     {
00035         if (item->type() == MappingComponentItem::Type)
00036         {
00037             MappingComponentItem* comp = static_cast<MappingComponentItem*>(item);
00038 
00039             foreach (QGraphicsItem* childItem, comp->childItems())
00040             {
00041                 if (childItem->type() != ProgramEntityItem::Type)
00042                 {
00043                     continue;
00044                 }
00045 
00046                 ProgramEntityItem* progEntity = static_cast<ProgramEntityItem*>(childItem);
00047 
00048                 foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, progEntity->getEndpoints())
00049                 {
00050                     foreach (EndpointConnection* conn, endpoint->getConnections())
00051                     {
00052                         QUndoCommand* cmd = new EndpointConnectionDeleteCommand(conn, this);
00053                     }
00054                 }
00055             }
00056         }
00057     }
00058 }
00059 
00060 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 // Function: ~SystemColumnDeleteCommand()
00062 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 SystemColumnDeleteCommand::~SystemColumnDeleteCommand()
00064 {
00065     if (del_)
00066     {
00067         delete column_;
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 // Function: undo()
00073 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 void SystemColumnDeleteCommand::undo()
00075 {
00076     // Add the item back to the layout.
00077     layout_->addColumn(column_);
00078     del_ = false;
00079 
00080     // Execute child commands.
00081     QUndoCommand::undo();
00082 }
00083 
00084 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 // Function: redo()
00086 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 void SystemColumnDeleteCommand::redo()
00088 {
00089     // Execute child commands.
00090     QUndoCommand::redo();
00091 
00092     // Remove the item from the layout.
00093     layout_->removeColumn(column_);
00094     del_ = true;
00095 }

00102     QUndoCommand(parent), conn_(conn), scene_(conn->scene()), del_(true)

00104 }

00112     {
00113         delete conn_;

00117 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00118 // Function: undo()
00119 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 void EndpointConnectionDeleteCommand::undo()
00121 {
00122     // Add the item back to the scene.
00123     scene_->addItem(conn_);
00124 
00125     // Connect the ends.
00126     conn_->connectEnds();
00127     del_ = false;
00128 }
00129 
00130 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 // Function: redo()
00132 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 void EndpointConnectionDeleteCommand::redo()
00134 {
00135     // Remove the item from the scene.
00136     scene_->removeItem(conn_);
00137 
00138     // Disconnect the ends.
00139     conn_->disconnectEnds();
00140     del_ = true;
00141 }

00143 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00144 // Function: EndpointDeleteCommand()
00145 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 EndpointDeleteCommand::EndpointDeleteCommand(EndpointItem* endpoint, QUndoCommand* parent) :
00147     QUndoCommand(parent), endpoint_(endpoint), parent_(static_cast<EndpointStack*>(endpoint->parentItem())),
00148     scene_(endpoint->scene()), del_(true)
00149 {
00150     // Create child commands for removing connections.
00151     foreach (EndpointConnection* conn, endpoint->getConnections())
00152     {
00153         QUndoCommand* cmd = new EndpointConnectionDeleteCommand(conn, this);
00154     }
00155 }

00171 void EndpointDeleteCommand::undo()

00174     parent_->addEndpoint(endpoint_);

00181 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00182 // Function: redo()
00183 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00184 void EndpointDeleteCommand::redo()
00185 {
00186     // Execute child commands.
00187     QUndoCommand::redo();
00188 
00189     // Remove the item from the scene.
00190     parent_->removeEndpoint(endpoint_);
00191     scene_->removeItem(endpoint_);
00192     del_ = true;
00193 }

00218 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00219 void PlatformCompDeleteCommand::undo()
00220 {
00221     // Add the item back to the scene.
00222     parent_->setPlatformComponent(item_);
00223     del_ = false;
00224 
00225     emit componentInstantiated(item_);
00226 
00227     // Execute child commands.
00228     QUndoCommand::undo();

00230 
00231 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00232 // Function: redo()
00233 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00234 void PlatformCompDeleteCommand::redo()
00235 {
00236     // Execute child commands.
00237     QUndoCommand::redo();
00238 
00239     // Remove the item from the scene.
00240     parent_->setPlatformComponent(0);
00241     scene_->removeItem(item_);
00242     del_ = true;
00243 
00244     emit componentInstanceRemoved(item_);
00245 }

00302 ProgramEntityDeleteCommand::ProgramEntityDeleteCommand(ProgramEntityItem* item, QUndoCommand* parent) :
00303     QUndoCommand(parent), item_(item), parent_(static_cast<MappingComponentItem*>(item->parentItem())),
00304     scene_(item->scene()), del_(true)
00305 {
00306     Q_ASSERT(parent_ != 0);
00307 
00308     // Create child commands for removing the endpoint connections.
00309     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, item->getEndpoints())
00310     {
00311         foreach (EndpointConnection* conn, endpoint->getConnections())
00312         {
00313             QUndoCommand* cmd = new EndpointConnectionDeleteCommand(conn, this);
00314         }
00315     }
00316 }
